org.apache.flex.swf.tags

Class DefineEditTextTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.Tag
      • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.CharacterTag
        • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.DefineEditTextTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICharacterReferrer, ICharacterTag, ITag

    public class DefineEditTextTag
extends CharacterTag
implements ICharacterReferrer
    Represents a DefineEditText tag in a SWF file.

    The DefineEditText tag defines a dynamic text object, or text field.

    A text field is associated with an ActionScript variable name where the contents of the text field are stored. The SWF file can read and write the contents of the variable, which is always kept in sync with the text being displayed. If the ReadOnly flag is not set, users may change the value of a text field interactively.

    Fonts used by DefineEditText must be defined using DefineFont2, not DefineFont.
